thread.title: BRIEF-ACI Provides Preliminary Financial Results for Fiscal Quarter Ended February 24, 2018

title: BRIEF-ACI Provides Preliminary Financial Results for Fiscal Quarter Ended February 24, 2018
text:
April 6, 2018 / 3:10 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-ACI Provides Preliminary Financial Results for Fiscal Quarter Ended February 24, 2018 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 6 (Reuters) - Albertsons Companies Inc: 
* ESTIMATES NET SALES & OTHER REVENUE WILL BE ABOUT $14.0 BILLION FOR FISCAL QUARTER ENDED FEB 24 
* SAYS ESTIMATES THAT ITS IDENTICAL STORE SALES GROWTH WILL BE 0.6 PCT FOR THE FISCAL QUARTER ENDED FEBRUARY 24, 2018 - SEC FILING 
* ESTIMATES THAT OPERATING INCOME WILL BE ABOUT $213 MILLION FOR FISCAL QUARTER ENDED FEB 24 
* ESTIMATES THAT ADJUSTED EBITDA WILL BE ABOUT $712 MILLION FOR THE FISCAL QUARTER ENDED FEBRUARY 24, 2018 Source text : ( bit.ly/2GCuZjQ ) Further company coverage:
